name: Hudson Valley Center for Innovation
description: Incubator in the Hudson Valley, NY
overview:
The Hudson Valley Center for Innovation, Inc. (HVCFI) was created to provide support and focus on economic development of the Hudson Valley region.

Two powerful not-for-profit Hudson Valley business entities, the Ulster County Development Corporation (UCDC), Ulster Countyâ€™s lead economic development agency, and the Hudson Valley Technology Development Center, Inc. (HVTDC), collaborated to create HVCFI. The center was designed to foster the growth and development of emerging, high value businesses and technology development firms, and the creation of high-value jobs in the Hudson Valley region of Upstate New York.

The Hudson Valley Center for Innovation is currently located in Lake Katrine, NY and at Sullivan Community College. More locations to come.

Member of the Business Incubation Association of New York State.
